projects.title: Fin-Tech Platform
projects.description: A full-featured Fin-tech platform with microservice architecture, money transfer with currency exchange, and payment processing. The application provides a seamless banking experience with fast page loads, responsive design, and is deployed on AWS using Kubernetes with automated CI/CD pipelines.
projects.shortDescription: Modern Fin-tech solution with Spring Boot, microservices, and AWS deployment
features: Auth Service: User authentication and authorization
User Service: User data management, including profile updates and account settings
Transaction Service: Secure and reliable processing of financial transactions and logs
Wallet Service: Digital wallet supporting multiple currencies and transaction history
Gateway & Discovery Service: Dynamic discovery of microservices and centralized routing
Credit Risk Prediction: ML-based assessment of borrowers for risk analysis
Deployment on AWS with automated CI/CD pipeline
Kubernetes for container orchestration and scalable deployment

projects.title: Real-Time Medical Emergency Response System
projects.description: A web platform for real-time tracking and dispatch of medical emergencies. Patients can request ambulances, and the nearest available providers are notified and tracked live using SignalR and Azure Maps.
projects.shortDescription: Real-time medical emergency dispatch system with live provider tracking
features: Patients can request ambulances in real-time
Automatic matching of requests to the nearest available providers
Real-time location tracking of providers using SignalR
Notifications sent to providers and patients for updates
Interactive frontend with Next.js and TypeScript
Backend built with .NET Core and SQL Server
Integration with Azure Maps for routing and navigation
Deployment and CI/CD managed via Azure DevOps
Dockerized services for scalable and reliable deployment

projects.title: Bassam: Interactive Ed-Tech Game (Mobile & Web)
projects.description: Ed-Tech Android game to help kids learn with the help of a customized LLM, including reading and pronunciation under the supervision of a teacher.
projects.shortDescription: Ed-Tech: Bassam mobile game to help kids learn
features: Evaluate kids' pronunciation
Use LLM fine-tuning with custom data (French PDF)
Show multiple-choice questions to help kids test their knowledge

projects.title: Smart E-Commerce Product Analyzer
projects.description: A system to scrape products from multiple e-commerce platforms, analyze and score them using unsupervised machine learning, and recommend the best products to sell. The system is deployed on Kubernetes (Minikube) with ingress and CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions.
projects.shortDescription: E-commerce product scraping, analysis, and scoring with ML and automated deployment
features: Scrape products from multiple e-commerce platforms automatically using Selenium
Analyze product data and calculate a score based on demand, price, and competition
Use unsupervised machine learning to classify and recommend best-selling products
Deploy services on Kubernetes using Minikube with ingress management
Automated CI/CD pipeline via GitHub Actions for continuous deployment and updates
Dockerized microservices for scalability and maintainability

projects.title: Syndic Management
projects.description: Developed a web application using Laravel, Tailwind CSS, and Blade components to manage and monitor residents and residences, incorporating over five user roles for advanced access control and functionality.
projects.shortDescription: Web application for residence and resident management.
features: Multi-role authentication
Secure API requests
Mini social media for posting reclamations and problems, and commenting on posts

projects.title: Oracle Manager for User-Friendly Database Administration
projects.description: Making the management of databases and backups easier and simpler, with no need to use the terminal.
projects.shortDescription: Oracle database manager with React and Spring Boot.
features: Auto-backup and recovery using RMAN
Show users, permissions, and roles
Revoke and assign roles
Secure the database

projects.title: Internship Project: Automation of Internship Process
projects.description: Automated the intern integration process within the company, streamlining PDF document creation and enabling effective monitoring and tracking of intern progress.
projects.shortDescription: Automated intern integration and tracking system.
features: Automate internship tracking
Digitalize internship attestation printing

projects.title: Unity RPG: The Quest for the Shortest Path
projects.description: Developed a game using the Unity engine with pathfinding algorithms like Dijkstra's and A* for sophisticated AI interactions. Leveraged graph theory to dynamically generate maps for unique playthroughs.
features: Randomly generated map for each playthrough
Random enemy spawn
Autoplay using shortest path algorithm
Interactive gameplay
